review: A fun product well worth the money.
author: patrick Kelly

review: Not in the feature list prior to purchase:  Only streams approved web streams like Netflix, Hulu.  Doesn't stream everything from our devices.  Useless to us.
author: Mr. James B. Leahy "jbl"

review: Very easy to use once installed, Now my parents use it to watch indian movies from youtube and share it on the tv
author: d.s

review: Great device and concept, wish more applications supported it, like Dropcam for example.  Since Dropcam is owned by Google I can't believe this oversight but happy overall.
author: Richard Bliss

review: Can cast from any tablet, phone, or computer that is connected to the same wi-fi. My kids love watching youtube videos on it.
author: Kevin Dale
